title: Cement prices up
body_lines: The price of a 50kg cement bag has been increased to Rs.1,850.
The price increase was due to the current dollar crunch and fuel price increase, the dealers said.
Before the price increase, a 50 kg cement bag was sold at Rs.1,350.
Though the prices have gone up, there is an acute shortage for cement in the market. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
